Name: Avenger: Endgame
Title: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in orderto reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

Name: Avatar
Title: Avatar is the story of the 'reluctant' hero Jake Sully - a former Marine officer who is half-paralyzed. His twin brother was selected to participate in a gene transplant program with the alien Na'vi to create a new species that can breathe the air on the planet Pandora...

Name: Kingdom in the clouds
Title: After building their own kingdom in the clouds, Nobita and friends discover a world where extinct animals and advanced sky-humans thrive.

Name: Pokemon: arceus and the pearl of life
Title: The legendary, invincible Arceus has returned to Michina to reclaim the Gem of Life. Even Dialga, Palkia, and Giratina combined could not stop Arceus' destructive power. But this time Ash and his friends will be there to find the only way out.

Name: Shaman King: The Last War
Title: The magician Asakura Yoh participates in the tournament held every 500 years, competing against other mages to become the all-powerful Sorcerer King.

Name: Captain America: Civil War
Title: The story revolves around Steve Rogers (Captain America) leading a team of superheroes with members of the Avengers with the goal of continuing their efforts to protect humanity...

Name: Once Upon a Time
Directer: Lý Quốc Lập, Trịnh Tiểu Đinh
Title: Previously, Bach Thien was betrothed to the Crown Prince of the Heavenly Clan, Da Hoa, since meeting Bach Thien in the Dong Hai glass palace, Da Hoa fell in love. Thanks to her son A Ly, Da Hoa has won Bach Thien's love. Kinh Thuong broke the bell of Dong Hoang, Da Hoa took the original god to sacrifice the bell, Bach Thien was in pain. Three years later, Da Hoa recovered her original spirit and resumed her love affair with Bach Thien.

Name: Journey To The West: Surprise
Title: Movie 'Journey to the West' - The film's content revolves around the 'super-smug' little guy Vuong Dai Thuy (Bach Khac) since he was born with two sharp horns on his head and a bit of 'smack' magic...

Name: Kung Fu Yoga
Title: Movie Kung Fu Yoga Jack is a Chinese archeology professor. He collaborates with beautiful Indian female professor Ashmita and assistant Kyra to find the missing Magadha treasure...

Name: Kungfu Panda
Title: When the mighty villain destroys the peace of his valley, the lazy panda takes up the challenge to follow his destiny - to become a martial artist.

Name: Batman: Exposing the Truth
Title: When a sadistic serial killer begins murdering key political figures in Gotham, Batman is forced to investigate the city's hidden corruption and question his family's involvement.

Name: Romeo and Juliet
Title: Shakespeare's famous play is updated to the hip modern suburb of Verona still retaining its original dialogue.

Name: Men in black: International
Title: The Men in Black have always protected the Earth from the scum of the universe. In this new adventure, they tackle their biggest threat to date: a mole in the Men in Black organization.

Name: Titanic
Title: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

Name: Venom
Title: A failed reporter is bonded to an alien entity, one of many symbiotes who have invaded Earth. But the being takes a liking to Earth and decides to protect it.

Name: Famous detective conan: Bride halloween
Title: During the wedding of Takagi and Sato, an assailant breaks and tries to attack Sato. But Takagi protects her while getting injured. The attacker escapes, but the situation is settled, although Sato is rightfully rattled by it all.

Name: Mr. Bean
Title: Bumbling, childlike Mr. Bean has trouble completing the simplest of tasks in day-to-day life, but his perseverance and resourcefulness frequently allow him to find ingenious ways around problems.

Name: Only You
Title: A love story centered on ex-boxer Chul-min and a blind telemarketer Jung-hwa.

Name: On your wedding day
Title: The movie The Most Beautiful Day is a very sweet 10-year love story of a passionate guy Woo-yeon and a girl who believes in 'fate for the first 3 seconds of meeting' Seung-hee...

Name: Deadpool
Title: A wisecracking mercenary gets experimented on and becomes immortal but ugly, and sets out to track down the man who ruined his looks.

Name: Home Alone
Title: Home Alone 1 was nominated twice for the Oscars. The film tells the story of 8-year-old Kevin McAllister who is left at home by his family while his family is on vacation in France...

Name: Battleship
Title: Movie Battleship: A fleet of ships is forced to battle a fleet of unknown origins to detect and stop their destructive targets. Based on the Milton Bradley game of the same name, Battleship is one of the most notable blockbusters of this summer...

Name: Despicable Me 2
Title: Gru sheds her past as a mischievous thief to focus on raising 3 daughters, Margo, Edith and Agnes. But just when Gru decided to retire with his family and become a model father, a secret organization with a global scale came knocking...

Name: Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero
Title: The Red Ribbon Army, an evil organization that was destroyed by Goku in the past, has been reformed by a group of people who created new and more powerful Androids, Gamma 1 and Gamma 2, and seek revenge against Goku and his family.

Name: The Meg
Title: Having once escaped death from a giant shark, Navy captain Jonas Taylor has to face this most dangerous animal in the ocean again - in a situation a hundred times more difficult. Five years ago, when the On a mission, Jonas Taylor encountered a giant shark that killed half of the crew...

Name: Godzilla: King of the Monsters
Title: The appearance of Godzilla in the past led people to discover giant Titan ancient creatures that still exist on Earth. After the battle to defeat the enemy, Godzilla disappeared into the seabed. One day, the three-headed dragon Ghidorah arose, leading to the awakening of hundreds of giant monsters...

Name: The Maze Runner
Title: The Maze Runner is a film adapted from the series of the same name with a fantasy content about a group of young people imprisoned in the 'Place' with an unclear memory, and the struggle to find a way out. How do they survive in the midst of a giant maze filled with dangerous creatures and changing solutions every night?

Name: Pacific Rim
Title: The film's content is about giant creatures called Kaiju that suddenly emerge from the sea and destroy everything in their way, humans have fought back fiercely and the years-long war has claimed lives. network of millions of people...

Name: Alien: Covenant
Title: The crew of the Covenant landed on the planet David's ship in the Prometheus movie went to in search of engineers. They did not expect the planet's ecosystem to have been altered by black matter...

Name: Godzilla vs. Kong
Title: When two arch-enemies meet in a spectacular battle, the fate of the world remains unknown… Removed from Skull Island, Kong and Jia, an orphan girl with a strong bond with I and the special security team headed to the new roof...
